description: Beautyberry (Callicarpa dichotoma f. albifructa 'Duet') is an amazing plant species with many unique features. It is a large shrub that produces a vibrant pink and white effect in late summer and fall with its two-toned berries. They have bright yellow flowers that in turn become the two-tone fruit that will keep a garden looking beautiful through winter and even into the new year. This is a low maintenance plant as it adapts well to a variety of environments, both sun and shade, and needs minimal pruning to stay attractive. Its natural decorative fruits make it a fetching addition to any backyard and its adaptability make it an ideal choice for gardeners.
